title: Photo Gallery Geo Tagging
description: A comprehensive multimedia application combining iOS (SwiftUI), Desktop (.NET C#), and Backend (Python Flask) technologies. Features real-time geolocation tagging, cloud storage integration, and advanced image processing.

title: Numerical Analysis
description: Mobile application implementing advanced numerical methods to solve mathematical problems. Built with Flutter for cross-platform compatibility, featuring real-time calculations, visualization of results, and comprehensive documentation.

title: Compiler Construction
description: A complete compiler implementation for a custom programming language built with .NET C#. Includes lexical analysis, syntax parsing, semantic analysis, and code generation. Demonstrates deep understanding of language design and compiler architecture.

title: Go Mart Gift Shop
description: Desktop application for gift shop management with features like product inventory management, customer relationship management, bill generation, and sales analytics. Built with Windows Forms and SQL Server database.

title: Weathering Desktop App
description: Real-time weather application that fetches current weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Features temperature visualization, weather forecasts, air quality index, and an intuitive Windows Forms interface.
